field.name: member_id
field.query: SELECT member.id AS id, CONCAT(user.name, ' - ', uni.name) AS member_uni FROM #__swa_member AS member INNER JOIN #__users AS user ON member.user_id = user.id INNER JOIN #__swa_university_member AS uni_member ON uni_member.member_id = member.id INNER JOIN #__swa_university AS uni ON uni_member.university_id = uni.id ORDER BY member.id DESC
field.label: Memeber

field.name: type_id
field.query: SELECT id, name FROM #__swa_qualification_type ORDER BY id ASC
field.label: Type

field.name: approved_by
field.label: Approved By
field.query: SELECT member.id AS id, CONCAT(user.name, ' - ', uni.name) AS member_uni FROM swan_swa_member AS member INNER JOIN swan_users AS user ON member.user_id = user.id INNER JOIN swan_swa_university_member AS uni_member ON uni_member.member_id = member.id INNER JOIN swan_swa_university AS uni ON uni_member.university_id = uni.id LEFT JOIN swan_swa_committee AS committee ON committee.member_id = member.id ORDER BY committee.id DESC, member.id ASC
